# Museum Moments

> Museum Moments is a curated exhibition of design inspiration. Each entry
> is hand-selected and described like an exhibit label. The things that
> inspire and are beautiful, whether generated by AI or shaped by human
> hands. An exhibition curated to build the beautiful in the age of AI.

## Creator
Curated by Juan Gabriel Delgado (https://juangabriel.xyz)

## Sections
- / — Masonry grid of curated design moments, filterable by category
- /m/{slug} — Individual exhibit with image, curatorial statement, and tags
- /about — Project ethos and newsletter signup
- /submit — Nominate a design moment for the archive

## Categories
Branding, Images, Interfaces, Objects, Spaces, Typography

## Content
Each moment includes a curatorial statement explaining why the work is
noteworthy. The archive spans logos, photography, web interfaces, physical
objects, architecture, and typefaces. All featured works are credited to
their original creators with links to the source.

- Newsletter: https://delightinthedetails.substack.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/juangadm/
